name: Chiptari Woman 2
description:
Chiptari Woman 2 is a fast-paced story-driven music game! Inspired by the legendary PS2 game Gitaroo Man.

This demo was made in under two weeks for Lowrez Jam 2021. It includes some core code from Chiptari Woman 1 with brand new music, characters and artwork. We ran out of time to polish track 2’s gameplay — follow us on Itch to hear about post-jam updates!

How to play:

  • Press the arrow keys to trace the green line
  • Hold spacebar when red notes reach the middle
  • In defend sections: press arrow keys in time with the red arrows
  • (Don't worry, the cat will explain everything)

Credits:

  • Music and sound effects by Mackievellian
  • Development and art by Pawprints
  • Additional music by Sean Bissett
  • Made with the Replay game engine
